title: Christine Lampard admits she almost called off her wedding to Frank as he made a BIG mistake the night before
text:
Christine Lampard admits she almost called off her wedding to Frank as he made a BIG mistake the night before Frank Lampard was lucky to wed Christine Bleakley after this Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Christine reveals pre-wedding row with Frank Lampard Share this video Get celebs   Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Christine Bleakley married former footballer Frank Lampard in sensational style just over two years ago. 
But the Irish TV presenter has revealed that she almost called off the whole thing – the night before the wedding. 
Talking on Loose Women , Christine admitted that she lost her temper with Frank. 
“There was nearly divorce before marriage,” she told the panel. Christine Lampard admitted she almost called off the wedding (Photo: Rex Features) Christine and Frank Lampard appeared on Loose Women together (Photo: Rex Features) 
“The night before our wedding we had the table plans done on one of those sticky boards where you could move the names around,” she explained. 
“I was out working and I came back and Frank and indeed all of my family who were also to blame thought it was really funny to change all the names around on the seating plan. 
“They’d all had a few beers having a great time, I’m stone cold sober. They thought it was funny.” Frank was on the wrong end of Christine's temper (Photo: Rex Features) 
Frank added: “We put people together who hate each other.” 
Christine admitted she lost it at her then husband to be. 
“I walk in and was like oh my god. Needless to say, if that is a raging temper,” she said. Frank revealed what's next for his career (Photo: Rex Features) 
Frank – who was being interviewed on the show for the first time by his wife – then cleared up rumours he’s heading to the big screen after retiring from football. 
“There’s certainly rumours. Acting’s not for me. I would love to get involved – I’m keeping options open, but maybe like documentary stuff, something grittier, maybe sport, ‘life-y’ stuff,” he said. 
“But in terms of the next James Bond, nowhere near!” Like us on Facebook
